title: What is wrong with League these days.
body:
Whats with league, at the start the game is fine Frame Rates all good but then at about 18 minutes in, on the dot the frame rate drops to 10-15 Fps this has been happening for ages, i asked others about if it happened to them to make sure it wasn't just me, they said it did and its been happening for awhile.
Riot plz explain because this is making the game unenjoyable when every game is like an old movie from the  1950s.
Riot please.

replies.body:
That sounds like your computer is over-heating.

Check yo fans foo'!

There is a certain expectation that if you play on high graphics that you will have a decent graphics card. The more you up the Quality the more polygon/ngons/triangles the card has to render.

Tl;dr New map more hd goodness.
try cleaning out pc upgrading drivers etc
